biotools.summary: SureTypeSCR is an R package for QC and rapid genotyping of single cell SNP array data. It encapsulates previously developed library SureTypeSC . The core consists of a two layered machine learning method that assigns a quality score to each SNP in an array. On top of that, SureTypeSCR implements various QC strategies to examine the data using packages from the tidyverse collection.
